result.title: Common Analytical Framework (CAF)
result.description: The Common Analytical Framework (CAF) integrates existing conceptual models, impact assessment tools, cost-benefit analysis tools and quantitative and qualitative indicators to provide guidance on how multi sector interventions and policies could be evaluated from the environment, health, social equity and economic perspective.
